name: Nutri Ninja 2-in-1
shortDescription: The Nutri Ninja 2-in-1 combines multiple kitchen appliances in one easy-to-use, powerful and compact tool. With one-touch pulse technology, it quickly performs nutrient and vitamin extraction. This Nutri Ninja blender comes with two 16 oz cups with sip and seal lids. It processes ingredients in a 40 oz all-in-one processor bowl for quick, complete and healthy meals. This 2-in-1 blender lets you crush ice, chop, blend, puree, mix, grate and make dough and batter. It also does treats such as smoothies and other cold and healthy drinks made from your frozen fruits and other items. Make savory salsas, soups and other dishes. This machine has 700 watts of power.
longDescription: <br><b>Nutri Ninja 2-in-1:</b><ul><li>1 Power Pod, 2 appliances: nutrient and vitamin extraction and food processing all-in-one</li><li>Powerful nutrient and vitamin extraction: the power to unlock the natural benefits of fruits and veggies</li><li>40 oz all-in-one processor bowl: crush ice, chop, blend, puree, mix, grate, make dough and batter</li><li>Nutri Ninja blender has a 700-watt interchangeable power pod with 1-touch pulse technology</li><li>Frozen blending: crush through ice and frozen fruit for cold, healthy drinks and smoothies</li><li>2 16 oz Nutri Ninja cups, two sip and seal lids and 30-recipe guide</li><li>16 oz bowl-in-bowl chopper with bowl-in-bowl chopper storage lid</li><li>2-in-1 blender makes 1 lb of dough in 30 seconds</li><li>1-year warranty</li></ul>
